sentences.en: A company sold 15 computers costing US $ 800 each for total US $ 15000.

sentences.en: He paid his three guineas a week regularly for board and lodging, baths costing extra.
sentences.cn: 他每星期按时缴付三畿尼的膳宿费, 外加洗澡费.

sentences.en: The film bears favourable technical comparison with Hollywood productions costing 10 times as much.
